name: Keto Cauliflower Fried Rice
ingredients: 3 tablespoons coconut oil or avocado oil
steps:
Cut cauliflower into florets and pulse in a food processor until it resembles rice grains. Alternatively, use a box grater.
Pat cauliflower rice dry with paper towels to remove excess moisture.
Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large wok or skillet over high heat.
Add beaten eggs and scramble until just set. Remove and set aside.
Add another tablespoon of oil to the pan. Add diced chicken and cook for 4-5 minutes until fully cooked and golden. Remove and set aside.
Add remaining oil to the pan. Add minced garlic and ginger, stir for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add carrots and peas, stir-fry for 2-3 minutes until vegetables are tender.
Add cauliflower rice to the pan, breaking up any clumps. Stir-fry for 4-5 minutes until cauliflower is tender but not mushy.
Return chicken and scrambled eggs to the pan.
Add coconut aminos (or soy sauce), sesame oil, and white pepper. Toss everything together.
Add green onions and stir for another minute.
Season with salt if needed.
Serve hot, garnished with sesame seeds.
